column1: The surgeon will make 1 to 3 surgical cuts in your breast.

You should probably wait to have a breast lift if you are: - Planning to lose weight - Pregnant or still nursing a child - Planning to have more children Talk with a plastic surgeon if you are considering cosmetic breast surgery.
